channel.title: Anyone Got TUT for adding Food Timers?
channel.description: I need a Tutorial for adding food timers anyone help?

item.title: Anyone Got TUT for adding Food Timers?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Hereâ€™s an example of implements it into the code Kindler posted.

case 391: // Manta ray long wait = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1000; while(wait != System.currentTimeMillis()) { Thread.yield(); } int health = playerLevel[3]; healing[1] = 24; healing[2] = 24; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = 2; if (playerLevel[3] <= health) { playerLevel[3] += 27; } else if (playerLevel[3] >= getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Got TUT for adding Food Timers?
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

i have one for manta

case 391: // Manta ray if (actionTimer == 0) { int health = playerLevel[3]; healing[1] = 24; healing[2] = 24; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = 2; if (playerLevel[3] <= health) { playerLevel[3] += 27; } if (playerLevel[3] >= getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } break;

to make it either faster or slower just change the " actionTimer = 2;" to either 3, 4 or 5

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone Got TUT for adding Food Timers?
